titleStmt.title: James B. Hardwick to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2193

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
Stanton Powell County ^Ky^
Sept 7th 1865
To His Excenelcy
Thomas E Bramlet
governor of the Commonwealth of Ky

The undersigned Presiding Judge of the Powell County Court would Respectfully Represent to youre Excelency that there is a vacancy in the office of Justice of the Peace in the 2d District of Powell County occasiond by the Removal of Samuel Randles from the County and that I would Recommend to youre Excelency Wm Roberts as a Sutiable Person to fill Said office and and do aske youre Excellency to Commishian him as such
Jas B Hardwick P J P C C

Justice Peace
Powell Co
Wm Roberts
apptd
13 Sept 1865
